issue.title: [FCD] Replace throw() with noexcept

discussion.p: Dynamic exception specifications are deprecated; the library should recognise this by replacing all non-throwing exception specifications of the form throw() with the noexcept form.
Replace all non-throwing exception specifications of the form 'throw()' with the 'noexcept' form.
discussion.blockquote: The proposed resolution of n3148 would satisfy this request.
